  • Constructor Details

    • Segment

      public Segment(int stageId, double location)
      Constructor for the sprint segment
      Parameters:
      stageId - : The ID of the stage associated with the segment
      location - : Where the segment finishes

    • Segment

      public Segment(int stageId, double location, double averageGradient, double length, SegmentType type)
      Constructor for the hill climb segment
      Parameters:
      stageId - : The ID of the stage associated with the segment
      location - : Where the segment finishes
      averageGradient - : The average gradient through the segment
      length - : The length of the stage measured in kilometres
      type - : The type of hill climb (HC,C1,C2,C3,or C4)
